index.certsStore-text: Authenticates the identity of a website and encrypts the information sent to the server
index.digital-signin-text: Linked the digitally created document to a digital certificate
index.doc-time-text: Certifies the time of creation of a document on the server
index.eseal-store-text: Aims to create a digitally valid seal, as proof of the transactions made

index.text: They are applied on behalf of legal persons, such as organizations or institutions, with guarantee of integrity and authenticity of the data source
index.title: Aims to create a digitally valid seal, with a proof character, of the transactions carried out on the platform
